contents:
Excellent! So the lucky rest of population in Spain can learn, for real this time.

This virus seems very selective in picking those who do not really understand what trying to survive actually means, and how serious it can be. Mostly lefties who listen to communist shit, as those in Wuhan already had showed.

And I recall earlier this day I saw news saying some students of Princeton quarantined after having a party with some people tested positive for the coronavirus.

Course online? Placebo for idiots.
